text: @BorisJohnson hey #liarjohnson just wondered how after being at #covid19 deaths door you've gained weight show no signs of shortness of breath when spouting your bullsh*t nor have difficulty walking when other real sufferers in ICU lost up to 3 stone in weight & walk aided by a zimmer frame
